data.name: you_must_report_org_data
data.value: You must report organisation details for January to June and July to December.

data.name: report_changes_to_your_organisation_details
data.value: report changes to your members’ organisation details

data.name: you_must_report_packaging_data
data.value: You must report packaging data for 2024. Report this data by 1 April, 2025.

data.name: you_are_currenlty_resubmitting_data_period
data.value: You have resubmitted packaging data for the July to December 2024 period.

data.name: packaging_recovery_notes
data.value: Packaging waste recycling note (PRN) and packaging waste export recycling note (PERN)

data.name: no_action_needed
data.value: No action needed at the moment

data.name: youve-been-invited
data.value: You’ve been invited to change your account permission, so you can submit data to the environmental regulator.

data.name: waiting-for-approval
data.value: Waiting for approval to submit data

data.name: well-email-you
data.value: We’ll email you when the environmental regulator has given you permission to submit data.

data.name: summary-members-info
data.value: When a member selects your compliance scheme in their ‘report packaging data’ account we’ll link them to your account.

data.name: add-manage-subsidiaries
data.value: Add and manage your subsidiary companies.

data.name: prn_paragraph_1
data.value: Review your recycling obligations calculations and accept PRNs or PERNs to meet them. You can also:

data.value: You need to register by 31 April for the current year

data.name: You_have_submitted_your_registration_data
data.value: You have submitted your registration data. It may take up to an hour for our systems to update.

data.name: You_will_then_need_to_pay_your_registration_fee
